statements: SELECT * FROM user_login_history;
SELECT user_id, login_time, login_ip FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT login_status, security_answer FROM user_login_history WHERE login_time >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT security_question, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_login_history GROUP BY security_question;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_login_history ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, login_time, login_ip, login_status, security_question, security_answer FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, login_time, login_ip, login_status FROM user_login_history WHERE login_status = TRUE ORDER BY login_time ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_login_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING login_count > 3 ORDER BY login_count DESC
SELECT user_id, MAX(login_time) AS latest_login FROM user_login_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_login DESC
SELECT user_id, login_ip, security_question FROM user_login_history WHERE security_question IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC, login_time ASC
SELECT * FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_login_history ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_login_history WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT user_id, device_info->>'device_name' AS device_name FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logins FROM user_login_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT user_id, login_time, ip_address, device_info FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_login_history WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1' AND device_info ->> 'browser' = 'Chrome' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_login_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_time, ip_address FROM user_login_history WHERE device_info @> '{"os": "iOS"}' ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, password_hash, security_question FROM account_security_info WHERE security_answer LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserLoginHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT login_ip, login_timestamp FROM UserLoginHistory WHERE login_timestamp >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, login_ip FROM FailedLoginAttempts ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_attempts FROM FailedLoginAttempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_attempts > 3;
SELECT * FROM AccountSecurityInfo WHERE two_factor_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp, login_ip FROM UserLoginHistory WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FailedLoginAttempts WHERE attempted_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM UserLoginHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING login_count > 10;
SELECT UserLoginHistory.user_id, AccountSecurityInfo.password_hash FROM UserLoginHistory INNER JOIN AccountSecurityInfo ON UserLoginHistory.user_id = AccountSecurityInfo.user_id;
SELECT user_id, two_factor_enabled FROM AccountSecurityInfo WHERE two_factor_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_login_history;
SELECT user_id, login_date, login_time FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, username FROM account_details WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, attempt_date, ip_address FROM failed_login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM account_activity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_login_history ORDER BY login_date DESC, login_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, login_date, login_time FROM user_login_history WHERE user_id = 12345 AND login_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_logins, MAX(login_date) AS last_login_date FROM user_login_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logins > 5
SELECT user_id, ip_address FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM account_details WHERE username = 'example_user')
SELECT a.user_id, a.username, b.activity_date FROM account_details a JOIN account_activity b ON a.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY b.activity_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, log_description FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, login_attempt_time, ip_address FROM failed_logins WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT * FROM account_locks WHERE unlock_time IS NULL AND lock_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, last_login FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT users.username, security_logs.log_description FROM users JOIN security_logs ON users.user_id = security_logs.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 2;

SELECT users.username, user_sessions.login_time, user_sessions.logout_time FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE user_sessions.logout_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_sessions.logout_time DESC;
SELECT users.username, failed_logins.login_attempt_time, failed_logins.ip_address FROM users JOIN failed_logins ON users.user_id = failed_logins.user_id WHERE failed_logins.ip_address = '127.0.0.1';
